details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك، وأغنني بفضلك عمن سواك
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اكْفِنِيْ بِحَلاَلِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِيْ بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
details.transliteration: Allaahummak-finee bihalaalika 'an haraamika wa 'aghninee bifadhlika 'amman siwaaka.
details.translations: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
details.reference: At-Tirmithi 5/560. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 3/180
